home.text_base_description: Jetliner downtown Los Angeles skyscraper views from every room draw you in giving the heightened experience that only high-rise living brings out. Inviting entry foyer hall expands to open loft-style living providing unobstructed transitions between living room, dining area, galley kitchen & floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors to large private terrace. Simplified spaces for easy entertaining combined w/ hard-surface flooring throughout, modern fixtures, in-unit washer/dryer, chic powder room & dramatic master suite w/ ample closet space. Double vanity spa-like master bath with oversized dual shower. Full service amenities: 1 car parking with storage, valet guest parking, refined lobby, updated hallways, security, concierge, pool/spa, clubhouse, rooftop sundeck, yoga room & gym all w/ comparatively low HOA dues. Convenient to Runyon Canyon hiking, Sunset Strip & the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
